xuiHertz
filter in module xui

Description

[DEPRECATED, please, use xuiUnitConversion instead] Filter used for formatting hertz value. Unit suffix is automatically added based on value.

Usage

In HTML Template Binding

{{ xuiHertz_expression | xuiHertz:precision:plusSign }}

In JavaScript

$filter('xuiHertz')(hertz, precision, plusSign)

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
hertzstring

The source value.

precisionnumber

Precision of formatted value. Extra trailing zeros are removed independently of the precision.

plusSignstring

If true and source value is positive, plus sign prefix is added.
